subject: Re: Timbertop and Slat spec sheets and product page updates

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Hey team,

On the Perforate Slat product page we need the Fire Testing categories to be '25mm' and '42mm' to reflect the spec sheet (change from 13mm and 31mm)

Thanks

Hi Lucy, 

Sure, confirming we have made the below updates. 

Re the fire testing, we separated them out into their own rows based on 13mm vs 31mm. It's the best solution based on the current setup. I think for the refresh we will build more functionality into this section as it gets messy with all of the numbers etc. 

https://acoufelt.com/au/product/perforate/
https://acoufelt.com/au/product/slat/

Let me know what you think?
@glen can you also work on this one? thanks!

Hey Heath,

We have made some updates to our Timbertop spec sheets which will also affect the specifications listed on the product pages.

Please ensure:

  • USGBC/LEED logo is removed
  • Acoustic graph and table is updated as per spec sheet
  • Fire testing results for CORE and FACING across both products is updated. On this, is there any way we can clean up the layout in the table to make it clearer to read? We want to clearly differentiate between the CORE and FACING and different thicknesses.



Thanks heath!


Warm regards,


Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager
